original_text: Thus says the Lord: Take care for the sake of your lives, and do not bear a burden on the Sabbath day or bring it in by the gates of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 너희는 스스로 삼가서 안식일에 짐을 지고 예루살렘 문으로 들어오지 말며

sentences.original_text: Take care for the sake of your lives,
and do not bear a burden on the Sabbath day
or bring it in by the gates of Jerusalem.
